short_summary: Request for Proposal for Audit services
description: This is a Request for Proposal for audit services to perform audits of the Senate of Canada's Financial Statements in accordance with the Canadian public sector accounting standards for the fiscal years of 2024-2025 to 2026-2027.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Audit of Financial Statements of the Senate of Canada**

**Title**
English: Audit of Financial Statements of the Senate of Canada
French: Audit des États Financiers du Sénat du Canada

**Solicitation Number**
SEN-066 23/24

**Amendment Number**
7

**Publication Date**
January 25, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**
February 15, 2024, at 11:00:00 AM (EST)

**Modification Date**
February 15, 2024

**Expected Contract Start Date**
N/A

**Expected Contract End Date**
N/A

**Tender Status**
Expired

**Procurement Category**
Service (SRV)

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Method**
Open bidding

**Selection Criteria**
Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Trade Agreements**
N/A

**Regions of Opportunity**
Canada

**Regions of Delivery**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contracting Entity**
Senate of Canada
40 Elgin Street, 11th floor, Ottawa, ON, Canada K1A 0A4
Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca
(613) 995-8888

**Tender Description**
The Senate of Canada invites qualified suppliers to submit a proposal for the audit of its financial statements for the fiscal years 2024-2025 to 2026-2027, in accordance with the Canadian public sector accounting standards.

### Important Notes
* RFP queries must be sent via email to Proc-appr@sen.parl.gc.ca by February 6, 2024, at 11:00:00 a.m. (EST). 
* Enquiries submitted after this deadline may not receive a response.
* Bidders should clearly reference the relevant RFP item number in their query.
* Proprietary information must be clearly marked as such.

### Tender Package
The tender package includes the following documents:

* Addenda 1 (EN): [addenda_1_e_02012024_final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30459/addenda_1_e_02012024.pdf)
* Addenda 2 (EN): [addenda_2_e_02062024_final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/30459/addenda_2
